programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep17
programme.desc: Rupert and the Giant Sunflower - Rupert is very excited. Mother Nature has given him a special elixir to help his sunflower seeds grow but there's a big surprise to come.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep18
programme.desc: Rupert and the Cuckoo Clock - When Mum's cuckoo clock breaks time stops and Ping Pong, Ming, Edward and Bill freeze in time. Rupert and the Fox Twins have to find a way to get time ticking again

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep19
programme.desc: Rupert and the Magic Books - When Ping Pong says she is too busy to join a story reading day Raggety magically brings the books to life and they fly to Ping Pong's Pagoda, where they start to tell her their stories.

programme.title: Rupert Bear Ep20
programme.desc: Rupert and the Mischievous Genie - Rupert, Ping Pong, Bill, Edward and Raggety find some magical, musical stepping stones deep in the woods and unwittingly unleash a naughty young genie bent on making mischief.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep17
programme.desc: When Will The Water Come Back? - Jess is concerned that all the water on the farm is frozen and sets about working out when it will come back. He works out that once the sun is out the ice melts and learns all about freezing and melting..

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep18
programme.desc: How Can We Paint The Lilly Pad Green? - Mimi is trying to prepare for a visit from Horace and wants the hutch to feel like home for her froggy friend. Jess promises to paint the special seat Mimi has made for Horace green for her, but first he has to work out how to make green from different colours.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep19
programme.desc: Where's My Feather Gone? - Jess thinks that Little Bird has dropped a feather as a gift for him to keep and play with so he's very worried when it goes missing. He searches for it and finally he finds it, right in Little Bird's nest, keeping her warm.

programme.title: Guess With Jess Ep20
programme.desc: Where Have All The Stars Gone? - Jess is having a sleepover and wants to wish on a star with the puppies like Willow has told them to. But they all fall asleep. When he wakes in the morning to find the stars are gone he has to work out why and when they'll be back

programme.title: Olivia Ep35
programme.desc: Olivia Runs A Carnival - When Mrs. Hogenmuller's class plans a Parents' Night, Olivia thrills her classmates when she suggests the idea of a carnival. In her own special way Olivia oversees the construction of games and amusements, and when the night of the carnival arrives, she still has a few surprises up her sleeve.

programme.title: Olivia Ep36
programme.desc: Olivia Makes Magic - After seeing Grandma perform an impromptu magic show, Olivia begins practicing her own magic tricks. She doesn't have much success, until she manages to make herself disappear for Ian and Julian. They can't figure out how she's done it, but Ian doesn't care. He just wants his big sister back!

programme.title: Olivia Ep37
programme.desc: Olivia Visits The Aquarium - On a school trip to the aquarium, Olivia and her classmates compete to be the first to view all the exhibits and win a chance to help feed the sea-lions. Olivia is partnered with Francine, and the two girls have to reconcile their different approaches in order to win the prize.

programme.title: Olivia Ep38
programme.desc: Olivia And The Anniversary Surprise - It's Olivia's parents' anniversary, and they're planning a night out at a special restaurant. When they can't find a babysitter, Grandma happily volunteers. When Olivia suggests they all surprise Mum and Dad at dinner, she discovers the restaurant isn't at all the way she imagined, but it's a lot more fun!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep17
programme.desc: Why Crocodile Has A Bumpy Back - You see there was a time when Crocodile didn't have a bumpy back. His skin was all smooth and he had to be very careful of the hot Tinga Tinga sun. One day whilst napping Crocodile gets very sunburnt and falls into a deep sleep. Lion warns all the animals to be on their guard as the Wildebeest have returned to Tinga Tinga and they could stampede at any moment. Crocodile misses the meeting, snoring under the hot sun. The animals try to warn snappy Crocodile but it's too late and the Wildebeest stampede! OOOoof! . All over Crocodile. From that day on Crocodile has a bumpy back and is grumpier and snappier than ever! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep18
programme.desc: Why Jackal Howls At The Moon - You see there was a time when Jackal didn't howl at the moon. He was a trickster and he always wanted what was not rightfully his. Jackal took over Hen's nest and Aardvark's burrow. He even took the cub's supper from Mama Cheetah! Enough was enough! All the animals decide to teach Jackal a lesson and make him believe that the Moon is made of the sweetest, most delicious honey in Tinga Tinga. Of course, Jackal instantly wants some but it never comes. From that day on Jackal howls up at the moon, waiting for another drop of delicious MOOoooon honey! Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - The sun is never going to rise again!' soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep10
programme.desc: Par Avion - When Mega Fat tries to get Boss Baby fired while on an airplane to Pairs, Tim and Staci must prevent a baby meltdown

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep11
programme.desc: Cat Cop! - When baby families are leaving town, Boss Baby and Tim battle to prove Bootsy is behind it all

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep2
programme.desc: The Knights Code - Po and Blade's personalities clash as they track Klaus and Veruca and fight off some of Po's old foes. Blade gets to see Po's kung fu mastery, but doesn't agree to team up with him until she realizes that he accidentally holds the key to finding Klaus and Veruca: he has a piece of the WuGao Gauntlet. Meanwhile, Klaus and Veruca continue on their path of destruction while looking for the mysterious "Lotus".

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep11
programme.desc: The Poppy Horror Picture Show / Dinkles Dinkles Little Star - After hearing a scary story Poppy tries to help Biggie get over his fearsHoping to enhance Mr. Dinkles selfconfidence Biggie enters him into a Bergen pet show.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep76
programme.desc: All Hail, Puss! - With the earthquakes in San Lorenzo becoming unmanageable, Puss turns to the sky gods, who give him mighty powers

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep25
programme.desc: The Tide Is Nigh / Rain Gran - Eep takes up death-guarding at the watering hole, but finds out it's more mundane than she thought. Grug and Sandy get competitive when town members encroach on their treasure hunting/Gran convinces Grug that she controls the weather, but the power goes to her head when all of Ahhh! Valley believes her. Thunk tries to overcome his fear of thunderstorms.

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep11
programme.desc: Hit or Myth in Greece - When Odlulu uses the Greek Myth Key to bring Greek myth to life and capture the Golden Fleece, the Wanderers embark on a legendary quest to restore order in modern Athens. With the help of Jason (of Argonaut fame) the Wanderers build a "Trojan Fritz" to help get past the Cyclops.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep22
programme.desc: The Itch To Switch / Mismatched Socks - When Tag is frustrated living in a crowded house, and Scooch is bored in a quiet house, the two friends switch houses for the day. At first they both love their new lives. But as Scooch gets overwhelmed by all the activity at The Barker house, and Tag gets bored by the quiet life at the Poochs, they eagerly switch back before the day is done. \ When the Pawston Get Sox go on a losing streak, Tag and Scooch come up with the idea to have a team mascot. And Frank and Beans are the perfect fit! But when the two mascots start to clash over who gets the spotlight, Tag has to help save their friendship, and the big game!

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep2
programme.desc: Delivery Disaster / Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep21
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Space Suit - It's a snowy day in Greendale, and Ted Glen has invited the kids to his workshop to meet his friend, space expert Professor Farrow. Julian's excited but so is Pat, who has always yearned to be an astronaut. He's even more thrilled when he finds that his special delivery is a space suit - an extra surprise for the kids. When his van breaks down in a snowy lane, he finds an ingenious solution - only to suffer a puncture - and Ted is unable to help... Meanwhile, Professor Farrow and Lauren take the kids out into the snow and re-create the surface of the moon. Pat's determined to make his delivery, but how will he make it on foot through the snow? As the kids perfect their snowy moon, a space-suited figure approaches - Pat in the space suit. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep22
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Stormy Birthday - It's Chris Beacon's birthday and he's looking forward to spending the day onshore and having a party at the village hall. Pat's SDS mission is to pick up all the presents from everyone who won't be able to be at the party later. The kids and Lauren are working on decorating the village hall and making Ben a big card from them all whilst Nisha and Ajay provide special birthday cakes for Chris and Micawber and Alf and Dorothy send over lovely fresh eggs and cheese and a special homemade woolly jumper. Meanwhile, the weather is getting worse out at Pencaster Lighthouse and Chris realises, sadly, that he'll have to stay and man the lighthouse and make sure that the passing boats are protected. He won't be able to join everyone for his birthday after all! But Pat has a great idea if Chris can't come to the birthday party, the birthday party can come to him! With the help of the SDS helicopter Pat delivers all of Chris's birthday presents directly to him at the lighthouse! Everyone contacts Chris by video conference so that even if they can't be there, he's not alone on his birthday! Special delivery service mission accomplished!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep24
programme.desc: Charged Up - Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep24
programme.desc: The Four Flamingos / The Roaring Rooster - Archibald eats too many beets and teams up with lumberjacks for a logging competition. Sage tries to earn all his Roaring Rooster badges in one day.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep24
programme.desc: Are You There Frank? It's Me, King Julien - Frank the Sky God comes to the lemur kingdom to prove his existence and to demand the ultimate sacrifice: King Julien himself.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky and the Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky borrows Snips for a day to see what its like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep37
programme.desc: A Tale of Three Kiddies / Austland City Limits - In honor of #ThrowbackThursday, each Harvey Girl shares a story from her past. Gerald takes the gang to visit his hometown.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep37
programme.desc: The Day Mel Fell/Burns Ex Boo - Mel Shellman gets fired and crashes with the FAST crew, but he's so annoying they try to get him rehired; An old flame shows up, making Chet jealous.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep2
programme.desc: Delivery Disaster / Slippery Business - When Donna's delivery truck breaks down, it's up to the crew to help Donna continue delivering packages to Harmony Harbor's residents. / When the crew takes on a mission to rescue a lost pet, Ellie must face her fears in order to help save the day.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep24
programme.desc: The Four Flamingos / The Roaring Rooster - Archibald eats too many beets and teams up with lumberjacks for a logging competition. Sage tries to earn all his Roaring Rooster badges in one day.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep32
programme.desc: Scrap to the Future / Bringing Up Birdy - As shes preparing for the Hearts & Crafts Festival, Poppy finds a mysterious scrapbook that seems to predict the future and it shows the festival being a disaster! She and Branch set out to prevent the predictions from coming true. But is there a downside to being over prepared?/When a nest full of just-hatched baby birds imprint on Branch, he must overcome his fear of birds in order to raise them right.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep2
programme.desc: Colossal Strawberry/The Sappening - When Berry sees a "giant strawberry," she's convinced that the prophecy of the berry colossus has com e true and that she's been chosen to lead her people to their true calling. Rocksy, meanwhile, is devastated that her friend is leaving, unti she realizes the strawberry is actually a pinata and Berry is in danger! / Twig is afraid his sapping will put the Mighty Ones in peril, but Rocksy aims to show him that his sap can be used for good.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep45
programme.desc: Written By - When Dulcinea searches for clues on the Crown of Souls, she finds the author of the Wee Compendium book and holds him hostage until she gets answers

programme.desc: Scooter Buskie - The worlds worst baby is on the loose and Boss Baby, Tim and the team must find him before he turns the whole neighborhood against babies

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep2
programme.desc: Cat's in the Cradle - When an unexpected kitten shows up on Boss Babys doorstep, they go head to head against the feline enemy

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep63
programme.desc: Snuffnut - Tuff fakes his own death to make room for Throk, but when Ruff tries to train the Changewing that she thinks ate Tuff, a flock of angry Changewings come for the dragon

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep64
programme.desc: Searching For Oswald And Chicken - On a search for Dagur's dad, Hiccup and Dagur encounter vicious Grim Gnashers, and Tuff's search for a missing Chicken leads him to discover she has a second family

programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Troublesome Treachery of the Thieving Toot Fairy - George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.desc: Away Game / Monster Cash - Abuela worries that Ronnie Anne and Bobby will want to live at their Dad's new apartment instead. // Carl hosts a haunted tour based on Abuela's tale of 'El Cucuy,' and learns that it may not be fiction.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Trend Game / This Bird Has Flown - When Ronnie Anne realizes that she's not up to date on all of the latest trends, she seeks help from Carlota. // Bobby struggles to find Sergio after wishing he would fly away and never come back.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep111
programme.desc: V.I.Peeved / Seor Class - Carlota worries that her family will embarrass her after her vlog is discovered by a famous musician. // Hector becomes Ronnie Anne and Carl's newest classmate after deciding to finish his schooling.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Uncredible Journey - Tinkle, Ouchie, and Pinkeye must venture back home together after being taken away by mistake.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep115
programme.desc: Host-a-Palooza - Patrick gets injured, so his family members take turns hosting the show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep248

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S07 Ep145

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Lake Crashers / Boo Light Special - The campers have a demolition derby under Lake Yuckymuck. // Desperate for help, Camp Master Krabs hires the Flying Dutchman to run the camp store.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep119
programme.desc: Painting with Squidward / Kamp Kow - Counselor Squidward is determined for his cabin to win the annual camp art competition. // The Kamp Koral campers befriend a cute cow with a big appetite.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep701
programme.desc: Waking History / Pranks Fore Nothing - Eager to uncover secrets from the past, Lisa uses her technology to wake up a frozen caveman. // To win the prank war between Fairway University and their rival Par College, Lori recruits the help of Luan.

programme.title: The Loud House S07 Ep703
programme.desc: Candy Crushed / Master of Delusion - Lola struggles to dampen her sweet tooth when mom challenges her to go an entire week without sugar. // Lincoln strives to impress the Amazing Brailster when he's chosen to be his assistant at the Illusion Chateau.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep109
programme.desc: Age of Evolution Pt. 1 - Twitch and Thrash wonder if they're the only two Terrans in the universe. With the help of Optimus, Bumblebee, Alex, Robby, and Mo, they relocate the cave of their origin and find much more than the Emberstone.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep258
programme.desc: Boss for a Day / The Goofy Newbie - Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong? // Patrick takes a job at the Goofy Goober when he finds out the employees get free ice cream.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep239
programme.desc: The Night Patty - SpongeBob helps out the Krusty Krab's night shift crew, but the customers crave something creepier than usual.

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep118
programme.desc: Power Heist - When Catarina Stripe (Torelai's mom) visits Monster High, Clawdeen is stunned when Catarina proposes a monstrous trade: Clawdeen's Moon Claw for Selena Wolf's old diary.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Flight Plan - Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep203
programme.desc: Guilt Trip / Short cut - Ronnie Anne and her primos try to win Maria a trip around the world. // When Carlota fails at hair cutting, she trains with the master barber himself - CJ!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep204
programme.desc: No Egrets / Meal Ticket - Ronnie Anne and Sid help Casey run his family food truck... at the Yoon Kwon concert! // Sergio is in for a treat when a group of baby birds think he's their mama!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S02 Ep205
programme.desc: Fool's Gold / Flight Plan - When they find a treasure map, the Casagrandes go on a wild search for Pancho Villa's gold. // Frida and Carlos go on a fancy plane ride, but Carl and CJ try to sneak on for an adventure of their own.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep175
programme.desc: It's a SpongeBob Christmas! - SpongeBob inadvertently helps Plankton enact his plot to put all of Bikini Bottom on Santas naughty list, and now has to stop Plankton before he gets his Christmas wishthe Krabby Patty secret formula!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S10 Ep209
programme.desc: SpongeBob's Place / Plankton Gets the Boot - When SpongeBob cooks at home, Mr. Krabs' customers leave his restaurant and head for SpongeBob's Place. // When Plankton gets kicked out of the house, it's up to SpongeBob to teach him how to win his computer wife back.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep177
programme.desc: The Good Krabby Name / Move It or Lose It - Mr. Krabs wants all of Bikini Bottom to eat at the Krusty Krab, so SpongeBob and Patrick go on an advertising blitz. // Mr. Krabs and Plankton circulate petitions to see which restaurant will get bulldozed by the city.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S08 Ep178
programme.desc: Hello Bikini Bottom! - A concert promoter wants to send SpongeBob and Squidward on the road, until greedy Mr. Krabs decides to manage themand their world tourhimself.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep104
programme.desc: The Yard Sale - GrandPat prevents his precious memories from being sold at a family yard sale.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep103
programme.desc: Pat-a-thon - Patrick hosts a telethon to raise money for snails who can't dance.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep208
programme.desc: The Break Up - When two Croc Bandits have a spat, it's up to Po and Mr. Ping to set things right.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: Legends of Awesomeness S02 Ep209
programme.desc: Kung Shoes - In an attempt to get out of training, Po buys some enchanted shoes that will heighten his kung fu abilities. Unfortunately for Po, the magical shoes are evil and will soon put him and all those around him in great danger.

programme.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Blue Spirit - After Sokka and Katara get sick due to being in the storm, Aang seeks out a cure and discovers he needs some frozen frogs in order to get them cured.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep301
programme.desc: Smotherly Love - Ma, an empty-nested mother possum, takes up residence in the Penguins Lair after they destroy her home.

programme.title: The Penguins of Madagascar S03 Ep312
programme.desc: Operation: Swap-anzee / Snowmageddon - The Space Agency sends Private to the moon. His ticket is downgraded to one-way and the other birds can't monkey around if they hope to get him home again. // Snowmageddon hits and traps Skipper and Marlene in the convenience store with X.

programme.title: Middlemost Post S02 Ep202
programme.desc: Parker Gets the Bird / Anchor Shackleton - Parker tends to a small strawberry garden until its survival is threatened by a horde of ravenous birds. // Parker discovers Angus can't swim, but with the little nimbus' help, the sailor's on his way to becoming a buoy.

programme.title: Breadwinners S01 Ep120
programme.desc: Big Screen Buhdeuce / Weekend at Furfle's - Buhdeuce is lured away from Breadwinning by the glitz and glamour of being a movie star. // When Mrs. Furfle falls into a deep magical sleep, SwaySway and Buhdeuce pretend she's awake so she won't miss her big date with T-Midi.

programme.title: The Barbarian and the Troll S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Mapmaker, Mapmaker, Make Me A Map - In need of a unique custom map for their next quest, Brendar and the group attempt to wine and dine the only map maker in Gothmoria capable of creating the map they need.

programme.title: Ollie's Pack S01 Ep123
programme.desc: Release the Hound / Cube is the Loneliest Number - Bernie pleads with Ollie and Cleo to let him keep a gross doglike monster they are intending to pack. // When Ashlor traps Ollie, Bernie, Cleo and Wowski, Ollie figures out how to escape to the Dark Cube.

programme.title: Rise of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S01 Ep123
programme.desc: One Man's Junk / Snow Day - The Turtles try to recover a piece of the Dark Armor from Repo Mantis's scrapyard. // A ferocious mutant tries to ruin April and the TMNT's fun day in the snow.

programme.title: Sanjay and Craig S02 Ep201
programme.desc: Hot Sauce Boss / Ghost Pool - When Chicken Chuck adds his own sauce to Pennys hot wings, a heated competition erupts between the longtime friends. // The kids go on a quest to find a legendary pool in the forest.

programme.title: Dorg Van Dango S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Dorg Wants to Stay / Dorg's in Charge - When Dorg's mom decides she's sick of Normill, the gang will need to use their powers to stop the family from moving! // When Dorg's left in charge of Voulez and her friends, they catch a glimpse of Jet without a disguise!

programme.title: Fanboy & Chum Chum S01 Ep110
programme.desc: Norse-ing Around / The Janitor's Apprentice - Fanboy and Chum Chum discover a frozen Viking in their icebox and decide to help him "achieve glory" so he can get into Valhalla. // As punishment, Fanboy and Chum Chum are told that they must help Janitor Poopatine clean up the school.

programme.title: T.U.F.F. Puppy S01 Ep116
programme.desc: Doom and Gloom / Law and Odor - Larry has finally snapped under Snaptrap's ruthless authority and forms his own evil agency, dubbed "G.L.O.O.M."! // Petropolis' worst smelling villain, the Stink Bug, has returned to make life odorous for T.U.F.F.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep603
programme.desc: The Flying School - The Winx go to Lynphea College for special training with the Specialists and Paladins, skilled warriors. When Selina sends the Treants to attack, the Winx are stripped of their powers and forced to return to Alfea.

programme.title: Winx Club S06 Ep604
programme.desc: Bloomix Power - The Winx train in Aisha's new gym to prepare to fight without powers. Afterward, they return to Lynphea to fight the Treants and a flying Cloudtower. Flora saves her sister Miele, and gains her new transformation Bloomix!

programme.title: Rainbow Butterfly Unicorn Kitty S01 Ep104
programme.desc: It Takes Two To Talent / Pot Luck - Felicity can't decide what to do for the Mythlandia Talent Contest while Miguel channels his guitar skills. // Felicity creates a rainbow, causing a leprechaun named Paddy to appear.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep231
programme.desc: My Leg! / Ink Lemonade - Now that Fred's leg has healed up, SpongeBob is determined to keep it out of harm's way...no matter what! // Patrick's lemonade stand isn't doing too well...until he gets a secret ingredient from Squidward!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep232

programme.title: 7.30 Ep172
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Sarah Ferguson presents Australia's premier daily current affairs program, delivering agenda-setting public affairs journalism and interviews that hold the powerful to account. Plus political analysis from Laura Tingle.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep28
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Josh learns how gardens heal us, Costa gets paving, Sophie creates home floristry, Clarence tours a habitat corridor, Hannah gardens on clay soil, plus we meet African communities uniting through growing food.

programme.title: News Breakfast Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Be the first to know the latest overnight developments, breaking news and the top stories this morning. Michael Rowland and Lisa Millar bring you news and interviews, joined by Tony Armstrong, Madeleine Morris and Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News Mornings Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - When big stories break, turn to Karina Carvalho in the mornings to bring you what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has more reporters in more places, serving and connecting communities and telling your stories.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - The leading news at lunchtime. Ros Childs brings you the day's top stories and the latest news as it unfolds, with reporters in the community across Australia and around the world reporting on the issues that matter to you.

programme.title: Gardening Australia Ep29
programme.desc: Sr. 34 - Jane visits a community restoring storm affected plots, Costa tours a heritage-listed garden, Tammy plants up a bromeliad basket, Jerry lifts the lid on compost critters, plus we meet a home gardener producing food for chefs.

programme.desc: Sr. 1 - While forests only cover 16% of Australia's land area, they harbour a higher concentration of animal species than anywhere else on the continent. (Final)

programme.title: Inside The Sydney Opera House - Back to Business Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - It's the start of a busy year at the Sydney Opera House as the Australian ballet returns. While a whirlwind of romance hits the house with 28 Valentine's Day weddings, disaster strikes and Vivid LIVE faces a washout.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep200
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Matthew Doran brings you all the very latest news and interviews on what's going on in the halls of Parliament House in Canberra and the topics and events making headlines from coast to coast in politics and national affairs.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep205
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a panel led by Julia Baird, Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier and Kathryn Robinson.

programme.title: ABC News Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Wherever you are and whenever you need us, ABC News is here to bring you round the clock coverage of the latest news and the day's stories. Plus reporters investigating issues that matter to you. Presented by Joe O'Brien.

programme.title: Secrets Of Our Cities - Footscray Ep2
programme.desc: Sr. 2 - One of the fastest settlements to develop, Footscray hasn't looked back. Once the industrial heart of Melbourne, it drew a European workforce from around the country and became known for it's strong sense of community.

programme.title: Kitchen Cabinet - Karen Andrews Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 7 - Former Home Affairs Minister and Liberal MP Karen Andrews has announced she will resign at the next election and in this candid interview she describes why Parliament House is the most sexist environment she's ever worked in.

programme.title: Planet America: Fireside Chat Ep13
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - One year out from the 2024 election, Chas and John look at the state of the nation and the polls. Plus the countdown to the 3rd Republican Primary Debate in Miami as GOP candidates fight for 2nd spot behind frontrunner Trump.

programme.title: If You're Listening - India or Bharat? Ep9
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - India might be getting a very old, new name. The story of how and why, reflects the history and traditions of a country defined by colonial boundaries and the caste system, while transforming into a potential superpower.

programme.title: The World Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Know what's going on in our world. Yvonne Yong presents the latest international news and a complete look at today's events with reports from ABC News correspondents and interviews with experts, commentators and guests.

programme.title: The World This Week Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Beverley O'Connor brings you a weekly roundup of international news from an Australian perspective as reported by ABC News correspondents covering the Indo Pacific, Europe, North America, the Middle East, India and Indonesia.

programme.title: Built To Survive - Wet and Wild Rainforests Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In the heat and humidity of the rainforest Phil reveals the survival adaptations of the elusive tree kangaroo, the colourful cassowary and the lethal scrub python.

programme.title: Aussie Bull Catchers Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Liz and Willie have just one day to catch the remaining 16 bulls they need to fill their order. After 4 weeks without work, Clarry is desperate to find a bull catching contract. Lach's teammate, Scanner, is horned by a bull.

programme.title: The Truth About Menopause With Myf Warhurst
programme.desc: Myf Warhurst is on the cusp of a big change: the change. She wants to know what's in store. Myf asks what is menopause, what are the symptoms, what can she do about it, and is hormone therapy safe?

programme.title: ABC News Overnight Ep220
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Follow the story with the latest on the day's events, explaining what's happening and why it matters. ABC News has reporters across Australia and around the globe uncovering what you need to know. Presented by Jade Barker.

programme.title: Close Of Business Ep40
programme.desc: Sr. 2023 - Are we headed for a Melbourne Cup Day interest rate rise? After 12 rate rises, the RBA paused rates but inflation has ticked higher again and market analysts now predict another rise before Christmas could be on the cards.

programme.title: That Pacific Sports Show Ep42
programme.desc: Sr. 3 - Tiana Penitani and Sam Wykes bring you a weekly hit of Pacific joy as they share inspiring stories of athletes with Pacific Island heritage. We profile aspiring athletes as they prepare for the 2023 Pacific Games.

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1005UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and UFC vet Leon Rocky Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep4
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep26
programme.desc: Mencari Ramli adalah program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 3 Ep10
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1004TeixeiravsProchazka
programme.desc: UFC 275 featured Czech MMA star Jiri Prochazka in his third Octagon outing as he sought UFC gold against newly minted light heavyweight champion, Glover Teixeira. Relive their fight with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: 2023 All Elite Wrestling Dynamite Ep2333

programme.title: 2023 Motul Grand Prix of Japan Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights - The MotoGP World Championship crowns one of 22 riders lining up on 1000cc prototype bikes capable of producing over 240 horsepower and getting up to speeds of 350kph over 21 Grand Prix races.
